page.title: 14A Loyal School Servant
page.content: Gerald,as everyone knows him,is the head waiter at West Buckland School.He has been employed by the school for 36 years.The whole school would come to a halt without Gerald because there would be no one to organise our meals and we would all starve. He has lived in his cottage for 27 years.He walks to work at six o' clock in the morning and gets home at about seven-thirty in the evening.He does this job because he enjoys being with his friends at school. In his spare time he likes to help on the farm next door to his house or to work in his garden,particularly growing vegatables.He is very interested in sport and listens to it on the radio all day while at work. His cottage has a thatched roof which he finds very warm.The cottage needs to be rethatched every 15 years.
